page.title: 03Pastimes in Escrick.
page.content: {Sport in Escrick Several sports are enjoyed in the area.The Cricket Club,believed to have been founded in 1880 plays in the delightful setting of Escrick Park. Tennis may be played at Queen Margaret's School,where there is also an excellent riding school.There is even a village walk which takes place several times a year. {Arts and Crafts} The York University Gilbert and Sullivan Choir recently gave a concert in St. Helen's Church.The Village Hall Committee organises an annual "Music Hall" when those village groups who wish to participate perform for three evenings;these productions are always sold out.The Women's Institute occasionally make their own entertainment,and read poetry,e.g. at Christmas.
